sect1.title: ICOL+ as BEAM plugin
sect1.para:
As a BEAM plugin, the ICOL+ processor needs the following software to be installed in advance:
BEAM, version 4.10
The BEAM software can be obtained from the BEAM download page (www.brockmann-consult.de/beam).

The ICOL+ software main package consists of the jar file for the ICOL+ main module (version 2.9):
beam-meris-icol-2.9.jar
The ICOL+ software package needs to be installed with the BEAM Module Manager in BEAM/Visat (see and the corresponding BEAM help documentation (http://www.brockmann-consult.de/beam/doc/help/visat/ModuleManager.html)).

sect1.title: Additional Requirements
sect1.para:
To be able to process all options properly, the ICOL+ processor needs the following add-ons to be installed in BEAM (if not already done):
MERIS L2 Auxdata module
MERIS Bottom of Rayleigh Reflectance (BRR) Processor
MERIS Surface Directional Reflectance (SDR) Processor
GETASSE30 DEM reader (required for LANDSAT TM processing)
GETASSE30 DEM (required for LANDSAT TM processing)
The MERIS L2 Auxdata, the BRR and SDR processor modules and the GETASSE30 DEM reader can also be installed with the BEAM module manager. See again BEAM help documentation for details.
